transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Pramod ji very good morning. Suresh baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Uh sir actually aap mujhe
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ek kaam kijiye na mujhe aadhe ghante me laga lijiye na.
Executive: Achha theek hai theek hai Pramod ji okay.
Customer: Aadhe ghante me lagaiye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Requested a callback in half an hour as he was busy.


Resolution:

- Agreed to call back in half an hour.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive will call back in 30 minutes.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent

@@@Key Topics:
- callback request
